meta.description: Determine the number of trips by freight and air to transport candles while minimizing the total number of trips.

sets.name: MODES
sets.description: Transportation modes available for moving candles.

params.name: capacity
params.description: Capacity in tons per trip for each mode.

params.name: cost
params.description: Cost per trip for each mode.

params.name: min_tons
params.description: Minimum tons of candles to be transported.

params.name: min_freight_trips
params.description: Minimum number of trips required by freight.

params.name: min_air_percentage
params.description: Minimum percentage of tons to be transported by air.

vars.name: trips
vars.description: Number of trips scheduled for each mode.

objective.name: min_total_trips
objective.description: Minimize the total number of trips.

constraints.name: min_tons_constraint
constraints.description: Ensure at least 200 tons of candles are transported.

constraints.name: budget_constraint
constraints.description: Ensure the total cost does not exceed the budget.

constraints.name: min_freight_trips_constraint
constraints.description: Ensure at least 5 trips are made by freight.

constraints.name: min_air_tons_constraint
constraints.description: Ensure at least 30% of the tons are transported by air.
